sourcesContent:
<template>
  <t-space direction="vertical">
    <!-- 按钮操作区域 -->
    <t-radio-group v-model="size" variant="default-filled">
      <!-- <t-radio-button value="small">小尺寸</t-radio-button> -->
      <t-radio-button value="medium">订单列表</t-radio-button>
      <!-- <t-radio-button value="large">大尺寸</t-radio-button> -->
    </t-radio-group>

   

    <!-- 当数据为空需要占位时，会显示 cellEmptyContent -->
    <t-table
      row-key="index"
      :data="data"
      :columns="columns"
      :stripe="stripe"
      :bordered="bordered"
      :hover="hover"
      :table-layout="tableLayout ? 'auto' : 'fixed'"
      :size="size"
      :pagination="pagination"
      :show-header="showHeader"
      cell-empty-content="-"
      resizable
      lazy-load
      @row-click="handleRowClick"
    >
    </t-table>
  </t-space>
</template>

<script setup lang="jsx">


import { ref } from 'vue';

const data = [];
const total = 28;
for (let i = 0; i < total; i++) {
  data.push({
    index: i + 1,
    oid:['001', '002', '003'][i % 3],
    ordertime: ['2022-01-01', '2022-02-01', '2022-03-01', '2022-04-01', '2022-05-01'][i % 5],
    cid: ['A001', 'A002', 'A003'][i % 3],
    status: ['待付款', '待发货', '已完成'][i % 3],
    detail:['订单详细'],
    totalprice: i * 100,
    confirm: ['确认订单']
    // status: i % 3,
    // channel: ['电子签署', '纸质签署', '纸质签署'][i % 3],
    // detail: {
    //   email: ['w.cezkdudy@lhll.au', 'r.nmgw@peurezgn.sl', 'p.cumx@rampblpa.ru'][i % 3],
    // },
    // matters: ['宣传物料制作费用', 'algolia 服务报销', '相关周边制作费', '激励奖品快递费'][i % 4],
    // time: [2, 3, 1, 4][i % 4],
    // createTime: ['2022-01-01', '2022-02-01', '2022-03-01', '2022-04-01', '2022-05-01'][i % 4],
  });
}

const stripe = ref(true);
const bordered = ref(true);
const hover = ref(false);
const tableLayout = ref(false);
const size = ref('medium');
const showHeader = ref(true);

const columns = ref([
  { colKey: 'oid', title: '订单号', width: '100' },
  { colKey: 'ordertime', title: '下单时间', width: '150' },
  { colKey: 'cid', title: '顾客号', width: '100' },
  { colKey:'status', title: '订单状态', width: '100' },
  { colKey:'detail', title: '订单详细', width: '100' },
  { colKey:'totalprice', title: '订单总价', width: '100' },
  { colKey:'confirm', title: '确认订单', width: '100' },
  // { colKey: 'detail.email', title: '邮箱地址', ellipsis: true },
  // { colKey: 'createTime', title: '申请时间' },
]);

const handleRowClick = (e) => {
  console.log(e);
};

const pagination = {
  defaultCurrent: 1,
  defaultPageSize: 5,
  total,
};
</script>


<style scoped>

</style>
